message: Yahoo Closed Egypt Office and Fired All Employees There http://bit.ly/17frsB1  does anyone has more info?
story: Ahmed Mohammad shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Yahoo Closed Cairo Office and Fired All Employees There
caption: arabcrunch.com
description: Yahoo Middle East has closed it office in Cairo and fired all its employees at the office. We do not know why they did so? But we will contact yahoo to get more details.

data.message: wow ... gotta call my friend and check he's been working there for more than a year.
It's 50% true ...My friend just confirmed that they closed their office in Egypt and fired half of the employees. They offered the rest to move to Dublin and Amman.
